title: ETSI Domain Application + Creative
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: etsi-domain-application-creative-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: 20335
	- preferred-term:: ETSI Domain Application + Creative
	- status:: draft
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on creative industries including digital art, music production, animation, film, design tools, and creative collaboration platforms.
	- source:: [[ETSI GS MEC]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: mv:ETSIDomainApplicationCreative
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: mv:VirtualObject
	- owl:functional-syntax:: true
	- belongsToDomain:: [[InfrastructureDomain]], [[CreativeMediaDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[ApplicationLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: etsi-domain-application-creative-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Metaverse]]
		- is-part-of:: [[ETSI Domain Taxonomy]]
		- enables:: [[Creative Application Classification]]
		- enables:: [[Collaboration Tool Categorization]]
		- categorizes:: [[Digital Art Application]]
		- categorizes:: [[Animation Software]]
		- categorizes:: [[Music Production Tool]]
		- categorizes:: [[Design Platform]]
		- depends-on:: [[InfrastructureDomain]]
		- depends-on:: [[CreativeMediaDomain]]

ontology.definition: Cross-domain marker for metaverse application components focused on creative industries including digital art, music production, animation, film, design tools, and creative collaboration platforms.
